controller

Class ExtractionControllerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ExtractionControllerBuilder

  • public class ExtractionControllerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The ExtractionControllerBuilder creates an ExtractionController object. It is developed with the builder pattern.

    Builder call example: new ExtractionControllerBuilder().once().create();

    See Also:
    ExtractionController

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExtractionControllerBuilder

        public ExtractionControllerBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public ExtractionController create()
        This function has to be called as the last function of the chain. It will create the ExtractionController.
        Returns:
        Returns the ExtractionController with the configuration specified by the functions, that were called in the chain before this function.

      • once

        public ExtractionControllerBuilder once()
        Call this function to start a single extraction and no continuous extraction.
        Returns:
        The altered builder.

      • headless

        public ExtractionControllerBuilder headless()
        Call this function to start the PET without any graphic. This will disable the GUI and the system tray icon. The GUI can be started afterwards from the CLI with the command "gui".
        Returns:
        The altered builder.
